preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KRCR_PARM_T WHERE NMSPC_CD='KFS-PURAP' AND CMPNT_CD='PaymentRequest' AND PARM_NM='ADDITIONAL_CHARGES_CLEARING_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS' AND APPL_ID='KFS'

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The chart of accounts to additional charges are expensed, if the PO is not encumbered. Used in conjunction with ADDITIONAL_CHARGES_CLEARING_xx Parameters.

delete.where: NMSPC_CD='KFS-PURAP' AND CMPNT_CD='PaymentRequest' AND PARM_NM='ADDITIONAL_CHARGES_CLEARING_CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS' AND APPL_ID='KFS'

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KRCR_PARM_T WHERE NMSPC_CD='KFS-PURAP' AND CMPNT_CD='PaymentRequest' AND PARM_NM='ADDITIONAL_CHARGES_CLEARING_OBJECT_CODE' AND APPL_ID='KFS'
